verses.verse: Hear <S%H8085><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> what <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is saying, <S%H559><s%> "Arise, <S%H6965><s%> plead <S%H7378><s%> your case <S%H7378><s%> before <S%H854><s%> the mountains, <S%H2022><s%> And let the hills <S%H1389><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> your voice. <S%H6963><s%>

"Listen, <S%H8085><s%> you mountains, <S%H2022><s%> to the indictment <S%H7379><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> And you enduring <S%H386><s%> foundations <S%H4144><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> Because <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has a case <S%H7379><s%> against <S%H5973><s%> His people; <S%H5971><s%> Even with Israel <S%H3478><s%> He will dispute. <S%H3198><s%>
"My people, <S%H5971><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> have I done <S%H6213><s%> to you, And how <S%H4100><s%> have I wearied <S%H3811><s%> you? Answer <S%H6030><s%> Me.

"Indeed, <S%H3588><s%> I brought <S%H5927><s%> you up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> And ransomed <S%H6299><s%> you from the house <S%H1004><s%> of slavery, <S%H5650><s%> And I sent <S%H7971><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and Miriam. <S%H4813><s%>

"My people, <S%H5971><s%> remember <S%H2142><s%> now <S%H4994><s%> What <S%H4100><s%> Balak <S%H1111><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Moab <S%H4124><s%> counseled <S%H3289><s%> And what <S%H4100><s%> Balaam <S%H1109><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Beor <S%H1160><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> him, [And] from Shittim <S%H7851><s%> to Gilgal, <S%H1537><s%> In order <S%H4616><s%> that you might know <S%H3045><s%> the righteous <S%H6666><s%> acts <S%H6666><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>"

With what <S%H4100><s%> shall I come <S%H6923><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> And bow <S%H3721><s%> myself before the God <S%H430><s%> on high <S%H4791><s%>? Shall I come <S%H6923><s%> to Him with burnt <S%H5930><s%> offerings, <S%H5930><s%> With yearling <S%H8141><s%> calves <S%H5695><s%>?

Does the Lord <S%H3068><s%> take <S%H7521><s%> delight <S%H7521><s%> in thousands <S%H505><s%> of rams, <S%H352><s%> In ten <S%H7233><s%> thousand <S%H7233><s%> rivers <S%H5158><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%>? Shall I present <S%H5414><s%> my first-born [for] my rebellious <S%H6588><s%> acts, <S%H6588><s%> The fruit <S%H6529><s%> of my body <S%H990><s%> for the sin <S%H9128><s%> of my soul <S%H5315><s%>?

He has told <S%H5046><s%> you, O man, <S%H120><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> And what <S%H4100><s%> does the Lord <S%H3068><s%> require <S%H1875><s%> of you But to do <S%H6213><s%> justice, <S%H4941><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> kindness, <S%H2617><s%> And to walk <S%H1980><s%> humbly <S%H6800><s%> with your God <S%H430><s%>?

The voice <S%H6963><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will call <S%H7121><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%> â€“ And it is sound <S%H8454><s%> wisdom <S%H8454><s%> to fear <S%H3372><s%> Thy name: <S%H8034><s%> "Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O tribe. <S%H4294><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> has appointed <S%H3259><s%> its time?

"Is there yet <S%H5750><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> in the wicked <S%H7563><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> [Along with] treasures <S%H214><s%> of wickedness, <S%H7562><s%> And a short <S%H7332><s%> measure <S%H374><s%> [that is] cursed <S%H2194><s%>?
"Can I justify <S%H2135><s%> wicked <S%H7562><s%> scales <S%H3976><s%> And a bag <S%H3599><s%> of deceptive <S%H4820><s%> weights <S%H68><s%>?

"For the rich <S%H6223><s%> men <S%H6223><s%> of [the] city are full <S%H4390><s%> of violence, <S%H2555><s%> Her residents <S%H3427><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> lies, <S%H8267><s%> And their tongue <S%H3956><s%> is deceitful <S%H7423><s%> in their mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

"So also <S%H1571><s%> I will make <S%H2470><s%> [you] sick, <S%H2470><s%> striking <S%H5221><s%> you down, <S%H5221><s%> Desolating <S%H8074><s%> [you] because <S%H5921><s%> of your sins. <S%H9128><s%>

"You will eat, <S%H398><s%> but you will not be satisfied, <S%H7646><s%> And your vileness <S%H3445><s%> will be in your midst. <S%H7130><s%> You will [try to] remove <S%H5472><s%> [for safekeeping], But you will not preserve <S%H6403><s%> [anything], And what <S%H834><s%> you do preserve <S%H6403><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> to the sword. <S%H2719><s%>

"You will sow <S%H2232><s%> but you will not reap. <S%H7114><s%> You will tread <S%H1869><s%> the olive <S%H2132><s%> but will not anoint <S%H5480><s%> yourself with oil; <S%H8081><s%> And the grapes, <S%H8492><s%> but you will not drink <S%H8354><s%> wine. <S%H3196><s%>

"The statutes <S%H2708><s%> of Omri <S%H6018><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the works <S%H4639><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Ahab <S%H256><s%> are observed; <S%H8104><s%> And in their devices <S%H4156><s%> you walk. <S%H1980><s%> Therefore, <S%H4616><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> you up for destruction <S%H8047><s%> And your inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> for derision, <S%H8322><s%> And you will bear <S%H5375><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of My people. <S%H5971><s%>"
